step.p:
1. Login to OLCP on CDS Client as administrator.
2. Launch instrument.
3. Create a new method.
4. Create a new sequence.
5. Run sequence.
6. Try to view running sequence.
7. Try to edit running sequence.

ul.li: CDS AIC 2.1 configured using simple server name.
CDS Client 2.1 configured using fully qualified server name.

result.p:
Step 5 - Sequence can be started without warnings/errors.
Step 6 - User can view running sequence without warnings/errors.
Step 7 - User can edit running sequence without warnings/errors.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:

For configuration details please see Data field.
